utterances.transcript: Yeah.
caption: yeah

utterances.transcript: She made me switch to light Mayo. That's it! That's all I got! And, you know what? It tastes the same and my pants fit better!
caption: she made me switch to light mayo that s it that s all i got you know what tastes the same and my pants fit better

utterances.transcript: Joey, I just think you're getting worked up over nothing. This is probably just a crush.
caption: joey you re getting upset for nothing this is probably just a crush

utterances.transcript: You think?
caption: you think

utterances.transcript: Absolutely! Y'know, you get this rush of feelings, but then it goes away.
caption: absolutely you get this rush of feelings but it goes away

utterances.transcript: Yeah, just a crush! That's all this is! It's a crush! I'm Joey; I don't get deep feelings.
caption: yeah just a crush that s all this is it s a crush i m joey i don t get deep feelings

utterances.transcript: That's right, there you go! Crushes happen all the time! I know I've had them for all you guys. Well, except for Ross and Chandler. And I'm sure you've had them for us.
caption: there you go crushes happen all the time i ve had them for all you guys except for ross and chandler and i m sure you ve had them for us

utterances.transcript: Not really.
caption: not really

utterances.transcript: Mm-hmm. Throw me a bone here.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Mm-hmm. (To herself) Throw me a bone here.
caption: throw me a bone here

plots: ... only they think he likes Phoebe , rather than Rachel .
Phoebe tells Joey that Joey 's affection for Rachel is just a passing crush ; it sounds good , but it does n't change the way Joey feels .
Phoebe talked about how things worked out well for Chandler and Monica but surprisingly becomes more complicated for Rachel and Ross .

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Central Perk, Rachel is on the couch as Ross enters.]

utterances.transcript: So, I uh... I called the doctor and now we both know the sex of the baby.
caption: so i uh i called the doctor now we both know the sex of the baby

utterances.transcript: What?
caption: what

utterances.transcript: That's right. The student has become the master.
caption: that s right the student has become the master

utterances.transcript: Ross, I swear, I don't know.
caption: ross i swear i don t know

utterances.transcript: Oh, come on, you know it's a girl!
caption: oh come on you know it s a girl

utterances.transcript: A what?!
caption: a what

utterances.transcript: You really didn't know?
caption: you really didn t know

utterances.transcript: We're having a girl?
caption: we re having a girl

utterances.transcript: No.
caption: no

utterances.transcript: That's what you just said!
caption: that s what you said

utterances.transcript: No.
caption: no

utterances.transcript: You said girl!
caption: you said girl

utterances.transcript: Yes. I'm... I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
caption: yes i m sorry i m so sorry

utterances.transcript: I'm not! We're having a girl! Sometimes I can't believe it's with you-But still! We're having a girl!
caption: i m not we re having a girl sometimes i can t believe it s with you but still we re having a girl

utterances.transcript: I know! I know. You know what? I'm putting Ruth back on the table!
caption: i know you know what i m putting ruth back on the table

utterances.transcript: Oh, yes! We'll have ourselves a little baby Ruth...
caption: yes we ll have ourselves a little baby ruth

utterances.transcript: Permission to veto.
caption: permission to veto

utterances.transcript: Yes, please.

plots: Ross accidentally reveals to Rachel that she is having a baby girl , and he floats the idea of naming the baby Ruth .

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Monica and Chandler's, Chandler enters as Monica comes from the bathroom.]

utterances.transcript: Hey.
caption: hey

utterances.transcript: Do I smell essential oils?
caption: do i smell essential oils

utterances.transcript: Yeah, I'm going to take a bath. I'm just going to get a magazine.
caption: i m gonna take a bath i was gonna get a magazine

utterances.transcript: Okay.
caption: okay

utterances.transcript_with_note: (As soon as Monica leaves the room, Chandler takes off his jacket and runs to the bathroom. Monica enters the bathroom to find Chandler in the bathtub.)

utterances.transcript: What do you think you're doing?
caption: what do you think you re doing

utterances.transcript: L-leaving my troubles behind?
caption: leaving my troubles behind

utterances.transcript: I know that you're new at this, but this is completely unacceptable bath decorum.
caption: you re new at this but this is unacceptable bath decorum

utterances.transcript: Oh, it's so hard to care when you're this relaxed.
caption: it s so hard to care when you re this relaxed

utterances.transcript: Fine, you can have the bath, but I am taking your boat. Now you're just a girl in a tub!
caption: you can have the bath but i am taking your boat now you re just a girl in a tub

utterances.transcript_with_note: (Phoebe enters the bathroom)

utterances.transcript: Hey!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (upset) Hey!
caption: hey

utterances.transcript: Hi, Bubbles. Manly. Well, I just thought I would drop by and let you know how it went with Joey.
caption: hi bubbles manly i thought i d let you know how it went

utterances.transcript: You told her?!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (To Monica) You told her?!
caption: you told her

utterances.transcript: She pulled it out of me! She's like a conversational wizard! How'd it go?
caption: she pulled it out of me she s like a conversational wizard how did it go

utterances.transcript: Well, you were wrong, he doesn't like me!
caption: you were wrong he doesn t like me

utterances.transcript: What?
caption: what

utterances.transcript: Yeah! How would you like it if I sent you to Lee Majors' house and told you that he liked you, and you went down there and you found out that he didn't like you? How would you feel?
caption: how would you like it if i told you that lee majors liked you and you found out that he didn t like you how would you feel

utterances.transcript: I don't think I'd care.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (Pause) I don't think I'd care.
caption: i don t think i d care

utterances.transcript: Really? Lee Majors is hot!
caption: really lee majors is hot

utterances.transcript: Hello?
utterances.transcript_with_note: (from outside the bathroom) Hello?
caption: joey hello

utterances.transcript: We're in the bathroom!
caption: we re in the bathroom

utterances.transcript: Why?
caption: joey why

utterances.transcript: Because it's a relaxing and enjoyable time!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (sarcastically) Because it's a relaxing and enjoyable time!
caption: because it s a relaxing and enjoyable time

utterances.transcript: What are you guys doing in here?
utterances.transcript_with_note: (entering the bathroom) What are you guys doing in here?
caption: what are you guys doing in here

utterances.transcript: Oh my God! A friend he's looking at differently, but it's wrong. It's Rachel!

utterances.transcript: You like Rachel?!

utterances.transcript: It's no big deal, okay? Phoebe and I talked about it. It's just a crush! It's going to go away! Dude, you gotta rearrange your bubbles! Oh!
utterances.transcript_with_note: It's no big deal, okay? Phoebe and I talked about it. It's just a crush! It's going to go away! (Looks down) Dude, you gotta rearrange your bubbles! Oh!

utterances.transcript_with_note: (checking for herself) (To Monica) Mazel tov.

utterances.transcript: Well hey! What's going on? Ooh, cool boat--Oh, no. Hey, did you, did you tell them?

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Joey and Rachel's, Joey is sitting at the counter eating Cocoa Puffs.]

utterances.transcript: All right. It's a new day, and it's just a crush, that's all! Just a little crush! All that worrying I was doing, that was crazy. Crazy! Like my friend here the bird would say, "it was cuckoo!" Everything's going to be fine. It's just a crush.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (thinking) All right. It's a new day, and it's just a crush, that's all! Just a little crush! All that worrying I was doing, that was crazy. Crazy! Like my friend here the bird would say, "it was cuckoo!" Everything's going to be fine. It's just a crush.
